input_args.text: 'Phony Jobs, Phony Recovery, Phony Regime----Now Comes The Reckoning By David Stockman.   We just had another "Jobs Friday" report and the underlying message could not have been more inimical to the "all is awesome" meme of the Wall Street/Washington establishment. Nor could it have been more timely and apt on the eve of an election where Donald Trump\'s insurgent candidacy has a fighting chance of crossing the finishing line.  '
